rules.name: Check_If_Create_Parent_Task
rules.label: See If We Create Parent Task

Flow.description: Flows for ESR cases Update for ESR PYF 3/19/2024 - ECP

formulas.name: NextBusinessDay
formulas.expression: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900,1,7), 7), 0, TODAY()+1, 5, TODAY() + 2 + 1, 6, TODAY() + 1 + 1, TODAY() + 1)

formulas.description: Get the 3rd business day from today
formulas.name: ThirdBusinessDay
formulas.expression: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900,1,7), 7), 0, TODAY()+3, /*Sun*/ 3, TODAY() + 2 + 3, /* Wed */ 4, TODAY() + 2 + 3, /* Thurs */ 5, TODAY() + 2 + 3, /*Fri*/ 6, TODAY() + 1 + 3, /*Sat */ TODAY() + 3)

Flow.label: Case ESR Flows

recordUpdates.name: Update_Follow_Up_Date_to_Next_Bus_Day
recordUpdates.label: Update Follow Up Date to Next Bus Day

recordUpdates.name: Update_Follow_Up_to_3rd_Business_Day
recordUpdates.label: Update Follow Up to 3rd Business Day

textTemplates.name: CaseEscalationChatterMsg
textTemplates.text: @[{!$Record.User_Level_1_Supervisor__c}] This case has been escalated. Please take a moment to review the case details.
